data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Panchkula, Haryana, India to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Panchkula, Haryana, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Panchkula, Haryana, India so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.section_summary: On average, 45 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Panchkula, Haryana, India.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Panchkula, Haryana, India.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Panchkula, Haryana, India.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Jat Johal people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, help 112 new simple churches start among the 561,300 people in the county of Panchkula, Haryana, India. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Panchkula, Haryana, India.
Spirit, encourage every one of the 6,174 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

location.name: Panchkula
location.people_groups_list: Gawaria, Jat Godara, Rajput Jatu, Khati (Hindu traditions), Chamar Raigar
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Gawaria (88,000), Jat Godara (29,000), Rajput Jatu (4,800), Khati (Hindu traditions) (1,630,000), Chamar Raigar (63,000)
